title: Side Effects of Writing for TV (with Kenya Barris)
description:
On this week’s show, we connect with writer extraordinaire Kenya Barris on creating your favorite -ishes and the nuance of nuance. Kenya's new show #blackaf debuts on April 17th on Netflix!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
